commands.name: 1. Create project
commands.commandLine: source /opt/bitnami/stacksmith-utils.sh && print_welcome_page && cd ${current.project.path} && npm install express@4.13.4 && express -f . && cp -rn /bitnami/mongodb/conf ${current.project.path} && npm install mongodb@2.1.18 --save && npm install && counter=0; until nc -z localhost 27017; do counter=$((counter+1)); if [ $counter == 10 ]; then echo "Error: Couldn't connect to MongoDB."; exit 1; fi; echo "Trying to connect to MongoDB at localhost. Attempt $counter."; sleep 5; done; echo "Connected to MongoDB database. Starting application server." && npm start

commands.name: 3. Stop
commands.commandLine: source /opt/bitnami/stacksmith-utils.sh && print_welcome_page && cd ${current.project.path} && pkill -u bitnami node && echo "Web server stopped."
